jd: From: Bhaskar, Mindedge Solutions bhaskar@mindedgesolutionsinc.co Reply to: bhaskar@mindedgesolutionsinc.co Hi,Hope you are doing well.Please share your resume for the below position. Position: Technical Program MangerLocation: Remote Job Description:The scope of the proposed services will include the following:· Develop understanding of the business environment and use that understanding to make informed decisions and drive results· Define program goals and objectives, and align them with the organization's strategy· Develop project plans and schedules, including resource allocation, timelines, and budgets· Lead cross-functional teams to deliver programs and projects on time and within budget· Manage risks and issues, and implement mitigation strategies as needed· Communicate project status and progress to stakeholders, including senior management· Collaborate with stakeholders and teams to ensure program and project goals are met· Ensure compliance with program management processes and standards.· Provide day-to-day support for on-going processes.· Provide on-going evaluation and improvements for processes; work in needed areas to provide technical support for agency’s work demands. Expertise and/or relevant experience in the following areas are mandatory:· Bachelor's degree· 5+ years of relevant experience· Strong project management skills, including budgeting, scheduling, and communication· Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, including Excel· Experience with collecting, analyzing, and reporting key data· Experience in program evaluation including evidence-based practices and outcome measurement· Experience navigating Louisiana’s governmental, business, and community landscape and various audiences/stakeholders· Available to work from Baton Rouge, LA on a regular basis Expertise and/or relevant experience in the following areas are desirable but not mandatory:· Master’s degree in business, mass communication, or related fields· Industry expertise in clean energy resilient hubs, utility-owned electric grid systems, and reduced-carbon energy resilience· Experience working with federal programs at the federal, state, local level, and/or private sector· Experience representing state government officials in public settings· Experience in and knowledge of the energy sector and its diverse stakeholders· Experience developing and implementing large-scale public initiatives and projects· Experience working across state government agencies to align and implement strategic priorities· A working knowledge of regulatory and statutory compliance requirements for federal programs· Experience communicating on behalf of appointed government officials and civil servants· Comprehensive knowledge of state level grant program administration· Experience in partnership development with community groups, non-profit partners, and/or government agencies Thanks & Regards,BhaskarSr. IT RecruiterMindedge Solutions IncPhone: (404) 738-0218Email: Bhaskar@mindedgesolutionsinc.co
